sentences.sContent: It's impolite to gibe at a foreign student's English.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's impolite to gibe at a foreign student's English.
sentences.sCn: 嘲笑外国学生的英语是不礼貌的。

sentences.sContent: It's unkind to gibe at a foreign student's english even though it may sound amusing.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's unkind to gibe at a foreign student's english even though it may sound amusing.
sentences.sCn: 嘲笑一个外国学生的英语是不应该的，就算他的英语令人捧腹。

sentences.sContent: "Please don't gibe me, " Lydia said. "I feel as repulsive and small as one of those deadly germs often portrayed in the horror movie genre. "
sentences.sContent_eng: "Please don't gibe me, " Lydia said. "I feel as repulsive and small as one of those deadly germs often portrayed in the horror movie genre. "
sentences.sCn: “请不要嘲笑我，”利迪娅说。“我觉得自己令人讨厌，渺小，像恐怖类电影描述的那些致命的细菌那样。”

remMethod.val: 也写作jibe， 但jibe还有另一个意思“与…一致”， 是GRE常考的释义
